泑泑泑

泑字的基本解释

泑
yōu
〔泑泽〕古湖泊名，即今中国新疆罗布泊，如“敦薨之山，敦薨之水出焉，而西流注于泑泑。”

泑
yòu
古同“釉”。

泑
āo
古水名，在中国湖南省长沙市。

泑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōu］
［《廣韻》於虯切，平幽，影。］
［《廣韻》於糾切，上黝，影。］
(1)传说中山名。
(2)传说中水名。
(3)古湖泊名。即今新疆罗布泊。
(4)同“釉”。

泑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泑； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页616第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於糾切，音黝。水黑色也。【說文】澤在昆侖山下。【水經】河水東注于泑澤。【註】卽所謂蒲昌也。　又山名。【山海經】泑，山神蓐收居之。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於虬切，音幽。義同。　又【正字通】窑器色光滑者，俗曰泑。　又【集韻】於交切，音坳。水名，在長沙。

泑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泑字的起名意思

传说中山名；传说中水名。

Gao
Basic explanation of words
Gao
yōu
[Liuze] The name of the ancient lake, which is now Lop Nur, Xinjiang, China, such as "Dunxie's mountain, Dunxie's water flows out of Yan, and the west flows in Liaolu."
Gao
yòu
The ancient same "glaze".
Gao
āo
Ancient water name, in Changsha City, Hunan Province, China.
Gao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōu］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiu cut, quiet, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Jiaoqie, on the dark, shadow. ]
(1) The name of the mountain in the legend.
(2) The name of the water in the legend.
(3) The name of the ancient lake. Now Lop Nur, Xinjiang.
(4) Same as "glaze".
Gao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泑; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 616 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Jiaoqie, the sound is dark. Water black also. [Said the text] Ze is at the foot of Kunlun Mountain. 【Shui Jing】The river water is injected into Luze in the east. [Note] The so-called Pu Chang also.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Shanhaijing】Return to the house of the mountain goddess.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Qiu cut, the sound is quiet. The same meaning.　[Zhengzitong] Those with smooth kiln color are said to be gloomy.　 [Ji Yun] in cross cutting, sound depression. The name of the water is in Changsha.
Gao

Gao
Name meaning
The name of the mountain in the legend; the name of the water in the legend.
yōu, āo
the vitreous glaze on china, porcelain, etc.
